User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the xô planilhas application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user entity.

displayName.description: Display name of the user, typically a combination of first and last name.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

icon.description: The name of the Lucide icon.

bgColor.description: The Tailwind CSS background color class.

registrationDate.description: Date and time the user registered.

customIncomeCategories.description: Custom income categories defined by the user.

customExpenseCategories.description: Custom expense categories defined by the user.

completedTracks.description: An array of slugs for completed education tracks.

Notification.title: Notification
Notification.description: Represents a user notification within the system.

userId.description: The ID of the user this notification belongs to.

message.description: The content of the notification message.

isRead.description: Indicates if the user has read the notification.

link.description: A URL path to navigate to when the notification is clicked.

entityId.description: The ID of the entity this notification relates to (e.g., an installment ID).

Income.title: Income
Income.description: Represents an income entry for a user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the income entry.

source.description: Source of the income (e.g., salary, freelance).

isRecurring.description: Indicates if the income is recurring.

recurrenceSchedule.description: Schedule for recurring income (e.g., monthly, weekly).

Expense.title: Expense
Expense.description: Represents an expense entry for a user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the expense entry.

category.description: Category of the expense (e.g., food, rent).

isRecurring.description: Indicates if the expense is recurring.

recurrenceSchedule.description: Schedule for recurring expense (e.g., monthly, weekly).

creditCardId.description: Optional reference to a CreditCard. If present, this expense is part of a credit card bill.

consumption.description: Optional consumption data for utility bills (e.g., '150 kWh', '25 m³').

Debt.title: Debt
Debt.description: Represents a debt/loan for a user.

name.description: Name of the debt (e.g., credit card, student loan).

Installment.title: Installment
Installment.description: Represents an installment payment for a debt.

userId.description: Reference to User. (Denormalized for security rules)

paymentStatus.description: Status of the installment payment (e.g., paid, unpaid).

paymentDate.description: Date when the installment was paid.

Goal.title: Goal
Goal.description: Represents a financial goal for a user.

targetAmount.description: The target amount for the goal.

currentAmount.description: The current amount saved towards the goal.

targetDate.description: Optional target date to achieve the goal.

Budget.title: Budget
Budget.description: Represents a spending limit for a specific category over a period.

name.description: A nickname for the card (e.g., 'Nubank Roxo', 'Inter Gold').

lastFourDigits.description: The last four digits of the card number.

limit.description: The total credit limit of the card.

dueDate.description: The day of the month the bill is due.

closingDate.description: The day of the month the bill closes.

RentalContract.title: RentalContract
RentalContract.description: Represents a user's rental or housing contract details.

landlordName.description: Name of the landlord or real estate agency.

rentAmount.description: The monthly rent amount, if applicable.

condoFee.description: The monthly condo fee, if applicable.

totalAmount.description: The total monthly payment amount (sum of rent, condo, etc.).

dueDate.description: The day of the month the payment is due.

HealthProvider.title: Health Provider
HealthProvider.description: Represents a health-related company or service provider.

HealthInsurance.title: Health Insurance
HealthInsurance.description: Represents the user's health insurance details.

cardNumber.description: The insurance card number for the main holder.

emergencyContact.description: Emergency contact number for the plan.

dependents.description: A list of dependents on the plan.

SubscriptionPlan.title: Subscription Plan
SubscriptionPlan.description: Defines a subscription plan available for users.

description.description: A short description of the plan.

price.description: The monthly price of the plan.

features.description: A list of features included in the plan.

paymentGatewayId.description: The ID of this plan in the payment gateway (e.g., Mercado Pago, Stripe).

active.description: Whether the plan is currently available for new subscriptions.

id.description: Unique identifier for the log entry.

level.description: The severity level of the log.

message.description: A description of the event that occurred.

createdBy.description: The UID of the user who triggered the event.

createdByName.description: The display name of the user who triggered the event.

EducationTrack.title: Education Track
EducationTrack.description: Represents a single educational track in the Financial Health Journey.

Challenge52Weeks.title: 52-Week Challenge
Challenge52Weeks.description: Represents an instance of the 52-week savings challenge for a user.

userId.description: The ID of the user this challenge belongs to.

startDate.description: The start date of the challenge.

initialAmount.description: The amount to be deposited in the first week.

incrementAmount.description: The amount to increment by each week.

totalDeposited.description: The total amount deposited so far.

status.description: The current status of the challenge.

Challenge52WeeksDeposit.title: 52-Week Challenge Deposit
Challenge52WeeksDeposit.description: Represents a single weekly deposit for the 52-week challenge.

id.description: Unique ID for the deposit entry.

challengeId.description: The ID of the parent challenge.

expectedAmount.description: The amount that is expected to be deposited for this week.

dueDate.description: The date this deposit is due.

status.description: The status of this weekly deposit.

depositDate.description: The actual date the deposit was made.

firestore.reasoning:
The Firestore data structure is designed to support the xô planilhas application, focusing on secure and efficient data management for user finances.  The design follows the core principles of Authorization Independence, Clarity of Intent, DBAC (Database-Based Access Control), QAPs (Queries are not Filters), and Invariants.

**Authorization Independence:** Achieved through denormalization of the `userId` field in the `incomes`, `expenses`, `debts`, `installments` and `goals` collections. This eliminates the need for `get()` calls to parent documents (users) in security rules, enabling atomic operations (transactions/batches) and simplifying debugging.

**Structural Segregation:**  Employed by storing all `incomes`, `expenses`, `debts`, and `installments` for a given user under the `/users/{userId}` path. This ensures that all documents within these subcollections share the same security requirements, simplifying rules and improving maintainability. All private user data is segregated under the user's document.

**Access Modeling:** Path-based ownership is consistently used for all user-owned data (incomes, expenses, debts, installments, goals). This makes security rules simple and efficient.

**QAPs (Rules Are Not Filters):** The structure enables secure list operations. Because all documents within a collection share the same security requirements and authorization information (`userId`), it's possible to write rules that allow listing only the documents that the user has access to, without having to filter based on document content.

**Invariants:** Enforced through clear ownership (`userId` in child collections) and consistent naming conventions. Timestamps can be added to each entity to track creation and modification times, if required.

**Logging:** A top-level `/logs` collection is added to store system-wide events. Access is restricted to superadmins for reading, while creation is allowed for any authenticated user to enable client-side event logging.
